original_text: The inner sanctuary he prepared in the innermost part of the house, to set there the ark of the covenant of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 언약궤를 두기 위하여 성전 안에 내소를 마련하였는데

sentences.original_text: The inner sanctuary he prepared in the innermost part of the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 집의 가장 안쪽 부분에 내소를 준비하였고,

sentences.original_text: to set there the ark of the covenant of the Lord.
